page.title: 20CHILDREN'S GAMES IN SWANAGE
page.content:
{"Army"}is a game where two equal teams have a base each. They fight with make-believe weapons, and if one gets shot, he has to pretend to be dead for ten seconds. We play this at home and at school. Computer games are very popular and in recent years nearly every school in Britain bought a computer. Our favourite computer game is{"Count Down {to Doom".}In this game you are stuck in a space-ship and none of the doors will open. You have to decide where to go and what to do. You have to try to escape and avoid the explosives. A game we play a great deal at school is{"Pom one-two-three".}It is very much like hide and seek. Generally the boys play{"Football"} and the girls{"Skip".}
St. Mary's First School Swanage.
